message: Let's start with a simple offer, Bob. I take $6000, you take $4000.  It's in your best interest to settle now before inflation eats away at your share.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a more equitable split. Let's be reasonable and avoid letting inflation erode the value any further.
Bob, it's clear we both want a reasonable share.  I'm adjusting my offer slightly, but time is of the essence.  Let's settle this before inflation eats away at your potential gains even more.
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Let's end this now and both avoid further losses from inflation.
